main.name: Suphawit Whangprayoat
main.description: Interested in Artificial Intelligence and realated fields
main.bio: I am a computer engineer who never loses the desire to learn and improve my talents. I never take the easy way out and always give my all in all that I do. I believe that being good at something means putting your 100 percent into it. Which is why I always striving to bring out the best in me in everything. Aside from my life as a computer engineer, I am also a trying hard gamer, a novel addict, and a loving friend
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: First-class honor Computer Engineering, Artificial intelligence major. Fix-half 4-years consecutive scholarship.
Experiencing research life at Shudo's labolatory, Mathematics and Computer Science. Research theme is about blockchain performance
Rank 1 in SAT-MATH2 test of the school

work.title: Associate Visionary Architect
work.description: I have two projects here. One is OriginCert. The project is about implementing a document system on blockchain network (Hyperledger). My work focusing on Front-end website and internal website to simplify the way we can interact with blockchain network. Including Api between the web and blockchain. Another project is research on the topic related to computer vision and security. Topic is classified.

work.title: Teaching assistant
work.description: Lead a team of 7 students in a Python lab. Guide group's members to solve each task and organize test for each lab. Exam scoring.

work.title: Information Technology Intern
work.description: Doing an internship at EXIM Thailand. Job including study company's network infrastructure, LAN setup for new department, Make a document of all IP in company associate with user's name and description using networking software

work.title: Greenhouse worker
work.description: By participating in Work & Travel program i have a chance to experience the working life in USA. Working as a greenhouse worker. Job including planting and arrange an order.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
